source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_SEQ_00<tab>Luquelot appears to be in need of assistance.
target: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_SEQ_00<tab>ベントブランチ牧場の飼育員ルクロは、何か「気になるもの」を見たというが……？

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_SEQ_01<tab>At Bentbranch Meadows, you learn from Luquelot that Ixali dirigibles have been crossing the Twelveswood's borders seemingly at will. Concerned that something may be amiss with the elementals, he has committed the details of his sightings to parchment, and bids you deliver the document to Miounne.
target: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_SEQ_01<tab>黒衣森でイクサル族の気球が飛んでいるのを目撃したルクロ。彼はその目撃場所を、手紙にしたためたのだという。グリダニアへ戻り、カーラインカフェの「ミューヌ」に「ルクロの封書」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_SEQ_02<tab>Miounne's face turns deathly pale as she reads Luquelot's letter. It would seem trouble is brewing, and that your aid is needed once more. Prepare yourself for a mission of grave import, and then request further orders from Miounne.
target: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_SEQ_02<tab>ルクロの手紙には、なにか厄介なことが書かれていたようだ。どんな事態にも対応できるよう準備を整え、ミューヌから詳しい話を聞こう。
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_TODO_00<tab>グリダニアのミューヌにルクロの封書を渡す

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_1<tab>My thanks for your kindness earlier. I hate to impose again, but I have need of your assistance in another matter─one of grave import, I fear.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_1<tab>おつかれさまです。
実は、お願いがあるのですが、聞いていただけませんか。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_2<tab>Of late, I have noticed that Ixali dirigibles have been appearing over the Twelveswood with increasing regularity. The frequency, however, does not bother me near so much as <var 1A 02 /var>where<var 1A 01 /var> they choose to fly─the patch of sky directly above the Guardian Tree.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_2<tab>先日、この黒衣森にある「長老の木」の上空を、
イクサル族の気球が飛んでいるのを何度か見かけまして。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_3<tab>The tree is a sacred site, or so I was given to believe when first I came to Gridania, and thus I naturally assumed that the elementals would not suffer the Ixal to profane it. Yet the birdmen have been coming and going as they please, with nary a sign of protest from the guardians of the Twelveswood.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_3<tab>普段だったら、森の精霊様は、
イクサル族など追い返してしまうのですが……。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_4<tab>And it was that which set me to thinking... Ever since the appearance of the much-talked-about “suspicious individual,” many and more strange things have been occurring in the forest. Could it be that he did something to the elementals?
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_4<tab>ここ最近は、例の「不審者」騒ぎの影響で
精霊様の力も不安定らしく、そんな気配がないのです。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_5<tab>In case it proved useful, I have committed the details of my sightings to parchment, and would ask that you deliver the document to Mother Miounne.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_5<tab>なんだか嫌な予感がしたので、ヤツらを見かけた場所を
手紙にしたためておきました。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_6<tab>Please make all haste─I have an irrepressible feeling that something terrible is about to happen.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_LUQUELOT_000_6<tab>グリダニアへ戻ったら、カーラインカフェのミューヌへ
この手紙を渡していただけませんか。
よろしくお願いします。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_10<tab>Hello there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Word of your tireless efforts at Bentbranch Meadows has reached my ears. The folk there have naught but the highest praise for you!
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_10<tab>やあ、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>。
ベントブランチでは、大活躍だったそうじゃないか。
ケーシャに喜んでもらえて、君を紹介した僕も鼻が高いよ。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_11<tab>You certainly have a knack for making Mother proud.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_11<tab>僕からも礼を言わせてもらうよ。
ありがとう！

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_100_11<tab>Keep up the good work, you hear?
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_100_11<tab>すっかりグリダニアに慣れたようだね。
これからも……。

TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_12<tab>……おや、なんだい？
僕に届け物だって？

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_13<tab>I haven't the slightest inkling what this could be about...
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_13<tab>……ルクロから、僕に手紙？
一体なんだろう。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_15<tab>I have a mission for you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Suffice it to say, it is urgent.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_15<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>。
……いや、もう余所余所しいのは止めよう。
君は僕たちの仲間だ。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_100_15<tab>I fear it may also prove dangerous, however, so you <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> be prepared.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_100_15<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
君の腕を見込んで頼みたいことがある。

source: TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_16<tab>Make what arrangements you can, and report back to me the moment you are ready.
target:
TEXT_MANFST006_00446_MIOUNNE_000_16<tab>少し厄介なことになるかもしれない。
準備ができたら、声をかけておくれよ。
